content: TE 800-AVR TE-S demolition hammer Very powerful TE-S demolition hammer for heavy-duty chiseling in concrete, with Active Vibration Reduction (AVR) ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Demolition hammers and breakers- - - ### FEATURES:Features Powerful breaking performance thanks to exceptional impact energy and innovative Hilti chisels Active Vibration Reduction (AVR) makes the tool less tiring to use – helping to increase daily productivity High robustness and long lifetime due to separate lubrication chambers Power reduction button for use on lighter materials and for greater precision in controlled breaking jobs Optional TE DRS-B dust removal system collects up to 95% of fine dust Applications Demolition work on walls Correction work on floor slabs Breaking out openings for doors and windows Making penetrations for ducts and pipes ### TECHNICAL DATA: Working direction: Wall, Floor Tool chuck type: TE-S Weight according EPTA-Procedure 01/2003 without battery: 23.4 lb. Technical Data | Working direction | Wall, Floor | Tool chuck type | TE-S | Weight according EPTA-Procedure 01/2003 without battery | 23.4 lb | Single impact energy | 15.5 ft-lbs | Full hammering frequency | 1890 impacts/minute | Max. chiseling performance | 153 in³/min | Dimensions (LxWxH) | 23.1 x 5.6 x 12.8 in | Triaxial vibration for chiseling into concrete | 9.0 m/s² | 1 | Dust removal system available | TE DRS-B | A-weighted emission sound pressure level | 90 dB (A) | 2 | According to the applicable product standard (see the Operating Instruction for more details) | According to the applicable product standard (see the Operating Instruction for more details) ### ITEMS- 3531084 - TE 800-AVR Performance Pkg Mix - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x TE 800-AVR 120V Breaker - 1x TE 800-AVR Tool case assy - 1x Hilti Grease 50ml - 1x Flat chisel TE-SX FM 36 - 1x Pointed chisel TE-SX SM 36 - 1x TE SH-STD 2 Comfort side handle - 3856307 - TE 800-AVR Performance Pkg Flat - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x TE 800-AVR 120V Breaker - 1x TE 800-AVR Tool case assy - 1x Hilti Grease 50ml - 2x Flat chisel TE-SX FM 36 - 1x TE SH-STD 2 Comfort side handle - 3856308 - TE 800-AVR Performance Pkg Point - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x TE 800-AVR 120V Breaker - 1x TE 800-AVR Tool case assy - 1x Hilti Grease 50ml - 2x Pointed chisel TE-SX SM 36 - 1x TE SH-STD 2 Comfort side handle - 3856309 - TE 800-AVR Performance Pkg Scaling - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x TE 800-AVR 120V Breaker - 1x TE 800-AVR Tool case assy - 1x Hilti Grease 50ml - 2x Scaling chisel TE-SX SC 43/8 - 1x TE SH-STD 2 Comfort side handle - 3528207 - TE 800-AVR with standard side handle - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x TE 800-AVR 120V Breaker - 1x TE 800-AVR Tool case assy - 1x Hilti Grease 50ml - 1x TE SH-STD 2 Comfort side handle - 2064659 - Breaker TE 800-AVR 120V - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x TE 800-AVR 120V Breaker - 1x TE 800-AVR Tool case assy - 1x Hilti Grease 50ml
